Roswell is a U.S. city in Fulton County, Georgia. It is named for Roswell King, a businessman who forced many slaves to run his plantation and cotton mill. ==References== Category:Cities in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Fulton County, Georgia
title: Roswell, Georgia
